column4: does anyone know of a good linux UML visualiztion tool thingy ?
when searching for UML in "add/remove programs" i got up with "gaphor". check it out

you think I'm advertising by asking someone to check that my site is up from their country ?
dunno, openmovieeditor.org ... how many are there ?
there's also Cinelerra, if you are looking for something advanced,
